## Peers.Interface interface

Peer dependencies interface

Signature:

```typescript
export interface Interface
```

## Properties

## Methods

| Method                                                                                    | Description                                           |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| [discover(type)](/api/bud-framework/peers/interface/discover)                             | Collect packages.                                     |
| [getManifest(name)](/api/bud-framework/peers/interface/getmanifest)                       | Returns manifest for a module from name (if findable) |
| [getPackageManifestPath(name)](/api/bud-framework/peers/interface/getpackagemanifestpath) | Returns path for a module name (if findable)          |
| [isExtension(name)](/api/bud-framework/peers/interface/isextension)                       | Returns true if a module is a bud                     |
